member.name: M:NutritionAPI.Presentation.Controllers.AuthenticationController.RegisterUser(Shared.DataTransferObjects.UserForRegistrationDto)
member.returns: Returns 201 Created if registration is successful; otherwise, returns BadRequest

member.name: M:NutritionAPI.Presentation.Controllers.AuthenticationController.Authenticate(Shared.DataTransferObjects.UserForAuthenticationDto)
member.returns: Returns OK with a JWT token if authentication is successful; otherwise, returns Unauthorized

member.name: M:NutritionAPI.Presentation.Controllers.FoodGroupsController.GetAllFoodGroups(Shared.RequestFeatures.FoodGroupParameters)
member.summary: Gets the list of all the food groups

member.summary: Gets a specific food group from a given food group code

member.name: M:NutritionAPI.Presentation.Controllers.FoodGroupsController.GetFoodGroupsOptions
